text: Mr Yeo is a dedicated tutor who will not hesitate to help the students whenever they reach out to him. He offers extra lessons for the students during EOY period. My child has benefited greatly from his coaching and has been consistently scoring A1 for his Maths. He enjoys Mr Yeo‚Äôs coaching that he refused to stop tuition even though he is doing well. He is a very clear and dedicated teacher and has extensive resources that aided me in grasping mathematics.  I really enjoyed every session and saw my understanding in math deepen tremendously. Mr Yeo is a passionate and enthusiastic Math teacher. He instilled a love for Math in me and helped me score A1 in all my exams. His notes and worksheets are very informative, organised, and detailed. If we have any problems with school homework, he would also guide us in solving them.

Jeff has been very patient and willing to help both my children. His teaching style is clear and he made challenging concepts simpler and easier to understand. His ability to teach at a pace that suits each students makes it comfortable to ask qns and learn at their own pace without pressure.
